scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises letters to John Wesley Hunt in Lexington, Kentucky, and account statements and receipts of John W. Hunt from purchasing goods. The letters from business associates discuss debts and payments as well as recommending horses and addressing land taxes in Kentucky. In a letter from August 4, 1802, Hunt's brother, Robert Hunt, tells John W. Hunt that his health has been very poor, and a letter from their brother Pearson Hunt on October 15, 1802, informs John Wesley of Robert's sudden death.
